definition: none lacking/none missing/everything is there/everyone without exception
not to be inferior in any aspects (idiom)/to surpass/to outdo/(derog.) to be even worse
pinyin: you3 guo4 zhi1 er2 wu2 bu4 ji2

definition: to triumph in every battle (idiom); invincible/to succeed in every undertaking
to triumph in every battle and win every fight (idiom); all-conquering/ever victorious/nothing they can't do
pinyin: zhan4 wu2 bu4 sheng4 , gong1 wu2 bu4 ke4

definition: to triumph in every battle and win every fight (idiom); all-conquering/ever victorious/nothing they can't do
pinyin: zhan4 wu2 bu4 sheng4 , gong1 wu2 bu4 ke4

definition: to triumph in every battle and win every fight (idiom); all-conquering/ever victorious/nothing they can't do

definition: not hiding anything he knows, not stopping before he has said it through (idiom)/frank/outspoken
pinyin: zhi1 wu2 bu4 yan2 , yan2 wu2 bu4 jin4

definition: not hiding anything he knows, not stopping before he has said it through (idiom)/frank/outspoken
pinyin: zhi1 wu2 bu4 yan2 , yan2 wu2 bu4 jin4

sentences.english: Some go even further to beat the heat, rolling up their pants legs.
sentences.chinese: 有些人爲了祛暑甚至過而無不及，竟捲起褲腿來。

sentences.english: Look at what you are doing now. You are much worse than your father.
sentences.chinese: 看你現在做的呢，有過之而無不及。

sentences.english: No one can enjoy freedom without trembling.
sentences.chinese: 人們無不在膽顫心驚中享受着自由。

sentences.english: It would not be inappropriate for a pastor to admonish those who appear to have the wrong priorities in this matter.
sentences.chinese: 牧師告誡那些似乎有錯誤優先順序的人，並無不當。

sentences.english: Shops that stay open twenty-four hours a day are a great convenience to the public.
sentences.chinese: 商店日夜服務，羣衆無不稱便。

sentences.english: Every adult still remains a child somewhere deep in his or her soul.
sentences.chinese: 每個成年人無不在內心深處保有一份童真。

sentences.english: The weakness of Human nature and social relationships all insinuate some human limitation.
sentences.chinese: 人性弱點和社會關係無不隱射出人的某種侷限性。

sentences.english: But in front of the person you like , you can.
sentences.chinese: 然而在喜歡得人面前，你言無不盡。

sentences.english: This pleased all the people, and Saul's officers as well.
sentences.chinese: 掃羅就立他作戰士長，衆百姓和掃羅的臣僕無不喜悅。

sentences.english: The dramatic increase in internet users during the past 10 years has been remarkable to witness.
sentences.chinese: 近10年來互聯網用戶迅猛增加，凡目睹者無不讚嘆。

sentences.english: These two layers of senses can be expressed by "neither excessiveness nor insufficiency" (or "appropriateness").
sentences.chinese: 這兩層意思都可以用“無過無不及”之“中”來表述。

sentences.english: Few people would not exult at the abolition of slavery.
sentences.chinese: 奴隸制被廢除了，人們無不爲之歡欣鼓舞。

sentences.english: There is not in the valley a tree or a stone I don't know.
sentences.chinese: 這山谷裏的一草一木我無不熟悉。

sentences.english: Love conquers all things except poverty and toothache.
sentences.chinese: 因此，愛情戰無不勝，只戰不勝貧窮與牙痛。

sentences.english: Grandmother could not help weeping emotionally , and all the others present were also crying, including Daiyu.
sentences.chinese: 當下地下侍立之人，無不掩面涕泣，黛玉也哭個不住。

sentences.english: Because of a friend's help and encouragement, you will be invincible and indomitable.
sentences.chinese: 因爲朋友的相助和激勵，你纔會戰無不勝，一往無前。
